statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 6 \\ -6 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -3 \\ 7 \\ 4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
